TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaGraphIoTHubMessageSink extends Azure.Media.Analytics.Edge.Models.MediaGraphSink

Docs.summary: Enables a media graph to publish messages that can be delivered via routes declared in the IoT Edge deployment manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: public MediaGraphIoTHubMessageSink (string name, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Azure.Media.Analytics.Edge.Models.MediaGraphNodeInput> inputs, string hubOutputName);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Azure.Media.Analytics.Edge.Models.MediaGraphNodeInput> inputs, string hubOutputName) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, inputs As IEnumerable(Of MediaGraphNodeInput), hubOutputName As String)

Docs.param: The name to be used for the media graph sink.
An array of the names of the other nodes in the media graph, the outputs of which are used as input for this sink node.

Name of the output path to which the media graph will publish message. These messages can then be delivered to desired destinations by declaring routes referencing the output path in the IoT Edge deployment manifest.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of MediaGraphIoTHubMessageSink.
